entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who pinched Harry's arm. She is likely a witch and a close friend of Harry.

entities.name: muggle
entities.description: Muggle refers to non-magical people. The woman in question is suspected not to be a Muggle.

entities.name: woman
entities.description: The woman is described as standing and gazing at the house, indicating she is likely a witch.

entities.name: house
entities.description: The house is mentioned as being invisible to non-magical people, implying it has magical properties.

relationships.description: Harry is facing the woman. This relationship is described in the first sentence of the passage.
Hermione pinched Harry's arm, indicating a close relationship between them.
The woman is gazing at the house. This relationship is described in the second sentence of the passage.
It is odd behavior for a witch to come out on a cold night, implying that the woman is not a Muggle.
